page.title: 15HOUSING
page.content: NEW HOUSES: appeal to young families_usually detached, made of reconstructed stone to blend with older properties (yellowish in colour)Four bedroomed with bathroom , additional toilet, gardens, living room, dining room and kitchen. Prices around Â£45,000. several new propties are at present being erected in the area for sale, hopefully to young families. (there in some concern in the area that young people are leaving the villages and older retired people are replacing them) these new propertes can be purchased outright but a scheme allowing the buyer to purchase part of his home is being introduced.
